text: 3.16 Stt 12.3, 12.7, Apo 7.5, 17.7, 1 Ko 12.12 Anɨb ak tek, God Eblaham ayɨp ñɨne ayɨp kɨlop gɨnɨgayn agɨl aglak takaw ak, kɨdek takaw olap ke ma agɨnɨgab. Pen takaw aglek, buk Baybol tɨkɨlak ak, Ñapay okok agɨl ma tɨkɨlak. Ñapay nokom ak agɨl tɨkɨlak. Ñapay nokom agɨlak anɨb ak, Klays nop nep agɨlak.
